title: Machine Learning Engineer
summary: As a machine learning engineer/researcher on the Apple Vision Pro team, you will orchestrate ground breaking artificial intelligence development and initiatives that are poised to revolutionize spatial computing! Our mission is to leverage computer vision fused with other modalities to understand human interactions with the physical, social, and virtual worlds. Our primary focus revolves around using machine learning for gaze tracking, paving the way for seamless and intuitive user experiences in the spatial computing era. In this pivotal role, you will work with world-class computer vision and machine learning researchers and engineers, as well as the best talents in other domains like silicon, camera technology, and VFX to collectively take on previously unsolved challenges and push the state of the art in the field. As a member of our team, you have the unique and great opportunity to craft upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day.
description:
Inventing and implementing state of the art computer vision algorithms to solve cutting edge problem.

Bring research ideas to production and directly impacting Apple products. 

Collaborating with other teams in software and hardware to ensure the full pipeline runs efficiently and utilizes Apple hardware effectively.

Have the opportunity to and present your work in world-class scientific venues in machine learning.
key_qualifications:
Domain expertise in training deep neural nets, such as CNN and transformers and proficiency in least one deep learning framework, for example PyTorch, TensorFlow
Strong fundamentals in 3D geometry and geometric computer vision
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to collaborate in a diverse environment
Publication record in relevant venues (e.g. NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV and etc) or track record of optimally building and shipping computer vision products
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience
